website_summaries.verdict: Many of the consumers agreed that the Adidas Run Lux Clima is a comfortable footwear. They lauded its lightweight structure and breathability. Some of them have issues with price and cushioning, but others still recommend the running shoe because of its amazing fit. Overall, customers are satisfied and happy with its fantastic design and construction.
pros: According to those who have tried it, the Adidas Run Lux Clima was breathable
The good color combination made the shoe visually-appealing, according to reviewers
One of the purchasers said that Adidas Run Lux Clima fit perfectly on her feet
According to one of the buyers, the shoe has a spacious toe box
A runner mentioned that the footwear was comfortable
Some testers admired the lightweight structure of the shoe
Several testers mentioned that it was stylish
cons: Based on some reviews, the shoe seems to be a little loose in the heel area when compared to other models
The Adidas Run Lux Clima was not well-cushioned, according to a reviewer
She felt a little pain when running on a treadmill

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was very drawn to the look of these shoes so I ordered 3 pairs to try on through Prime Wardrobe. I normally wear a women's 7.5-8 in shoes, but running shoes I'm more between an 8-8.5.. The 8 fit perfectly. They are such cute shoes but my one concern is that the footbed doesn't feel very cushioned like the other pairs of adidas running shoes I've had. Hopefully they will not make my feet hurt when I run on the treadmill. Anyone who needs more cushioning could probably size up and put in comfortable insoles, otherwise I think they will prove to be nice shoes for working out at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K.

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These running shoes are SO Deliciously Comfortable on my feet. I was searching for a shoe with a wide toe box, & I have found the shoe right here! My toes almost always hurt me after a run. These shoes have a big roomy toe box. The shoe feels amazing without socks & yet still feels secure & cradles the foot. This shoe is lightweight, yet it stretches with me, is not stiff & really no break in period. The mesh provides nice breathability...that I can feel. I really like this shoe & most likely will purchase a second pair in a different color 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Shann 🎀 Shann

customer_reviews.title: Hard fit...like a chastity belt for feet...not even a half star...😪
customer_reviews.text: I have run in addidas exclusively for over 20 years. However this particular design of addidas was the worst fitting running shoe of my career in running. I have blisters on the FRONT of my foot from the "steal sandpaper" label on the top of the tongue. I love addidas but this pair is not comfortable for me at all. I am training for the Army Ten Miler. I guess the positive is that I ran in these shoes before the day of... Addidas running is very good but NOT THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh G

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like you will never be able to fit your foot into the shoe, but it stretches and your foot pops in and wow, it is comfy. Well padded and good arch support. These may become a favorite. I wasn't sure what the color would be like, got the ones that look white and pick. They are an off whte, off grey and mauve pink color. I really like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Kat in OH

customer_reviews.title: Run Girl Run!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SHOES!! I jog about 2-3 times a week. I typically only like new balance for this and working out, but i wanted to try a different brand. These shoes are perfect they fit like a glove on my feet which are flat. The width is average so it fits my toe box great. These shoes are breathable and lightweight. Plus I love the colors. Would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Picture Not Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy, Perfect Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my weekly runs in the park. I ordered my true size and they fit like a glove. They are extremely lightweight, so I've taken to wearing them during my errands as well. I've also gotten a lot of compliments! The pink / green / black colors definitely stand out. Thinking about ordering a second pair for backup.
customer_reviews.author: YAHsmart

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable fit for lace placements and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how the cut outs would work but there aren’t a problem and don’t look bad. The shoe is comfortable, and it’s really cool how you can adjust the shoe laces into the different optional holes to tailor the fit. I have a wider foot with a higher arch and they feel great. The different lace holes make it so that my more narrow ankle area is still tight. The lowest laces could have gone into more narrow holes for a more narrow foot. Again, a cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Runs large!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these shoes so badly. They're adorable and breathable, but good grief they're HUGE. I normally wear an 8-8.5, so I went with an 8. They were so large all around that I probably should have gotten a 7-7.5. And I would say they aren't the most flattering style regardless of how cute they are.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for flat footed people
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit length wise but it was very narrow on the sides. It had to wholes on the sides as part of the design which i didnt like. The sides had stretchy material but was still to tight for me but i could get my foot in it though. There isnt any cushion on the sole either.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I sized up!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 1/2 in regular shoes, but I always size up to a 10 for a more comfortable fit when I wear socks. I've received compliments so I know they look good. I totally recommend for walking, because that's what I purchased them for. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: N. Geter

customer_reviews.title: love love love my new adidas
customer_reviews.text: love love love my new adidas!!!! so comfortable, it feels like walking on air. I was hesitant at first because these don't have memory foam but disregard that!! they don't but it doesn't matter because the light weight of the shoes and the sole make up for it . Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Adidas! We live in a very humid
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Adidas! We live in a very humid, sub-tropical environment. My wife loves how cool these keep her feet during runs. They look awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of the best shoes I have ever had. Very comfortable, good to wear it all day long. Good for running too. I love the color. I wish it didn't get dirt so fast, but well... it is white.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! Not only are they very cute but they’re soooo comfortable. I didn’t use these for running but I wear them to run errands and such. I love the air holes these shoes have! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany luchtel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They fit great and have high arch, which I need. Really thrilled with my purchase and much cheaper than they were at Ross!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Performance and style together.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for walking or dance class, and transforms nicely with jeans, joggers and other casual wear. I bought two pairs. Very pleased. I wear a 7 1/2 and I ordered a 7 1/2 and they fit perfectly. True to size. However, I prefer more support for running or high impact activities.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Waters

customer_reviews.title: BUY 1 FULL SIZE SMALLER
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful BUT the American size is way off. I’m a size 4.5 UK/37 EU and the pair I ordered size 7 are huge and are 5.5 UK/38.5 EU. I think the US size is actually the men’s size, not the women’s
customer_reviews.author: CityWoman

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I Usually wear size 6-6.5. I ordered a size 6 and it fits perfect. There’s still room so I would say it does run a tad bit large but other than that I love this white color!
customer_reviews.author: Rarr

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to keep these shoes. These shoes seemed to be a men's 9 rather than a women's 9.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much I have two pair of them and am considering a third! They are my go to running around shoes. Super comfortable. I’m always an 8.5 but the 8 fits perfect! Buy them now!
customer_reviews.author: MLH WI

customer_reviews.title: It does run a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9, I could’ve ordered a 8.5. After putting my Protalus insoles in, they are just right. Guess a 9 was best overall.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This was not the most attractive shoe at all? It ran very large especially across the front of the toe bed? I have never seen a shoe look this horrendous ! But thanks to Amazon, I was able to make a return?
customer_reviews.author: mslovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: one size to large. I ordered 2 different styles adidas shoes. Other pair true to size, this one too large. Gave it to a friend. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had a chance to try these on at a department store and loved them but the color wasn't for me (pink/green). So happy Amazon had them. They are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love love love !!! I bought 2 more pairs in different colors. They r the best no sock sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: TeriG

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work and they basically can go with anything. They're super comfy and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them to run in. I love the look and feel. For me they are extremely comfortable. I did have to order one size smaller than my usual sneaker size. My feet are flat and a little wide.
customer_reviews.author: Health and Wellness Coach

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wish they felt better, plastic bottom, not like the Adidas Pureboost I usually buy. Cute but walking any length of time they feel uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shane&Laceysmom

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Cute, and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments every time I wear these shoes. To find running shoes under $50 is amazing and these are stylish and comfortable. Well ventilated for warm climates and flexible lacing system to adjust to your feet. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: JGoldman

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are so airy, light, and comfy that I can wear them anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: USED SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE! They have been worn by someone else. I opened the box to take out the shoes and the bottoms had dirt on them like mud stuck between the ridges. In addition, the word “Bounce” on the sole had been partially worn off which confirmed my thought someone had used them before.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: may not work for all foot shapes
customer_reviews.text: The wide toe box and the arch support combined to aggravate my foot into Plantar Fasciitis. after one short 1 mile walk.
customer_reviews.author: TracyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cool style!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are comfortable and great when cross training and running. Would buy these in every color. This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kjones508

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to get them go a size smaller I were an 8 1/2 and mine really big I need a fit like they were a 9
customer_reviews.author: Silly girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. It feels as though you are walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: T Full

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, purchased three pairs! Wish I'd purchased more for the price of $23
customer_reviews.author: Eye Candy

customer_reviews.title: Long and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Stylish shoes, but not for wide+short feet. I ordered 6.5 which is my regular size and it’s about 1.5 inches longer extra space in front of my toes. Also really narrow. Very pretty shoes I wish it could fit better
customer_reviews.author: Mcat

customer_reviews.title: ... a bodybuilder/trainer for 22 years & these are THE BEST sneakers I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been a bodybuilder/trainer for 22 years & these are THE BEST sneakers I have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Adidas
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent. Great fit and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: I was in love with this shoes on the store
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this shoes on the store, but I do not felt happy to paid almost $120, so decide to do a lil research I’m finally a bought on Arizona’s for half the precies
customer_reviews.author: Lillyana

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my wife
customer_reviews.text: We liked everything. Quality finish. Nice design, as in photo.
customer_reviews.author: Vardan Mikayelyan

customer_reviews.title: Is it real
customer_reviews.text: I thought about it - not sure if this is an authentic adidas purchase. I tried to take shoe to local store they say - the shoe is not registered in the system
customer_reviews.author: PhD student1

customer_reviews.title: Must buy !!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little breaking out but I love it. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: kadelia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this shoe
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this shoe! The footbed is ideal for a high arch. It also fits narrow feet because it cups the heel. Nice wide toebox, too.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynAnn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the cuteness, and athletic look to them. Not only cute, but so light and airy.
customer_reviews.author: amanda baiz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! I get compliments every time I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Loves these so much I ordered them in a diff color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly for asian size
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was efficient, lux clima is best for running, lightweight and cushioning is just right for a run on the treadmill
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these shoes! So comfortable and they are perfect for the golf course!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Berry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful shoe , true to size but super tight .
customer_reviews.author: Brithany p.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing shoes Super comfortable and great for walking long distances!!! My second pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgi

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. A little snug around top of foot for first wear or two, then great.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! They fit as expected and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase and this account! They came in quickly and even included an extra set of tan laces and this pair of ASICS socks as a holiday gift:)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Scarborough

customer_reviews.title: Not the original I see white glue on the front top flat
customer_reviews.text: The shoe isn't cute like my nike but with my balance and fasciitis problems these are perfect. Solid heal stability my toes are flat not hitting or rubbing the shoe I feel good heel toe comfort as I walk. They are good for standing. Perks no socks the shoe has air to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Adams

product_meta.title: Adidas Women's Run Lux Clima W
